allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h ppv1-db.c6lwoh7tpmqk.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d ppv1_db -c "SELECT id, ""capturedAt"", ""capturedAt""::text, EXTRACT(TIMEZONE FROM ""capturedAt"") as tz_offset FROM screenshots WHERE id IN (''d2061cc0-522c-4f95-997d-35cac6e384d8'', ''d54d6d19-ee80-4c7f-9823-1c852aebf600'', ''697b1dce-942b-406a-907d-266aa0786c18'', ''a272e8ad-f1bd-4d30-8b64-9025c6e4d944'', ''9d9aa220-a2b4-4bb1-8545-c54eb1458298'', ''f5ef4fd0-491e-466c-8469-e322f1a3a0f4'') ORDER BY ""capturedAt"";")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h ppv1-db.c6lwoh7tpmqk.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d ppv1_db -c "ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS timezone VARCHAR DEFAULT ''UTC'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h ppv1-db.c6lwoh7tpmqk.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d ppv1_db -c "SELECT version, ""isSupported"", ""deprecationDate"" FROM app_versions ORDER BY ""releaseDate"" DESC;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h ppv1-db.c6lwoh7tpmqk.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d ppv1_db -c "SELECT s.id, s.""capturedAt"", ap.""startTime"", ap.""endTime"", ap.metrics FROM screenshots s JOIN activity_periods ap ON ap.""screenshotId"" = s.id WHERE s.id = ''72c329b9-5b7c-4ca2-af33-ae90edb02e11'' ORDER BY ap.""startTime"";")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h ppv1-db.c6lwoh7tpmqk.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d ppv1_db -c "SELECT version, ""isSupported"", ""deprecationDate"", ""releaseDate"" FROM app_versions WHERE version = ''1.1.0'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h ppv1-db.c6lwoh7tpmqk.ap-south-1.rds.amazonaws.com -U postgres -d ppv1_db -c "SELECT version, is_supported, release_date, deprecation_date FROM app_versions WHERE version = ''1.1.0'';")
